summary: Contains unit tests that verify the core functionality for extracting and converting configuration parameters from tabular data structures, ensuring correct handling of multiple data types, detection of invalid inputs, preprocessing steps such as whitespace trimming, and proper interpretation of boolean values when loading from CSV files. Also includes placeholder test functions that are currently unused.
business_intent: Validate the reliability and correctness of the parameter-loading mechanisms so that applications can safely ingest configuration data from dataframes or CSV sources with accurate type conversion and robust error handling.
